verses.name: John 5:13
verses.text: And he that was healed wist not who it was: for Jesus had conveyed himself away, a multitude being in that place.

verses.name: John 5:14
verses.text: Afterward Jesus findeth him in the temple, and said unto him, Behold, thou art made whole: sin no more, lest a worse thing come unto thee.

verses.name: John 5:15
verses.text: The man departed, and told the Jews that it was Jesus, which had made him whole.

verses.name: John 5:16
verses.text: And therefore did the Jews persecute Jesus, and sought to slay him, because he had done these things on the sabbath day.

verses.name: John 5:17
verses.text: But Jesus answered them, My Father worketh hitherto, and I work.
